productname: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications

personname.surname: Li, Product Manager SAP Solutions on Alibaba Cloud, AliCloud (Germany)

abstract.para: SUSEÂ® Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications is optimized in various ways for SAP* applications. This document explains how to deploy an SAP NetWeaver Enqueue Replication 1 High Availability Cluster solution. It is based on SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 and related service packs.
